name: Adventure Ponies
overview: An Atari 8-bit port of the flash game "Adventure Ponies" from the Hub network - based on the world of My Little Ponies. Use the joystick to control any of the mane characters as you navigate the various levels to collect the elements of harmony, and to defeat your foes. Although the game is full of cute, colorful graphics, the gameplay is more skill based platform/scroller action.
